scripts.say: The Sardegna Empire's territory lies just ahead of us...
It seems there are still Sirens loitering in these parts... Let's stay alert and move forward.
Let me see if I got this right. The Royal Navy came all this way just to ask us to rejoin the Azur Lane?
That's right. With the Siren threat looming over the Mediterranean, now more than ever we should join forces and fight side by side.
The "Siren" threat? Surely you jest. Are you not the ones threatening us?
As I just said, the Royal Navy is simply concerned with freedom of navigation for all peoples. We have never had any ulterior motives.
So the Royal Navy intervenes when the Sirens attack the Mediterranean, but sit and watch as hostilities escalate between us and Iris Libre, who happens to bend the knee to you?
And now that you've allowed the Sirens to slip into the Mediterranean past your oh-so-vigilant eyes, you want Sardegna to clean up after your mess. Is this your idea of keeping the peace?
Littorio, I know you're smarter than this. They may have been mass-produced units, but I find it very hard to believe that Sardegna would not have detected a Siren fleet of that size sooner.
So, if you didn't let them through, and our recon didn't spot them...
... you're saying that a Mirror Sea has appeared somewhere within the Mediterranean?
Indeed. We control both entrances to this sea, therefore the Sirens could only have appeared here through the presence of a Mirror Sea.
As they were first spotted near your southern sea border, chances are high that the Mirror Sea is somewhere in that area.
I see. So how does the Royal Navy plan to act?
For now, the Royal Fleet plans to scour the southeastern Mediterranean for the Sirens.
Then allow us to assist you with it. You'll have a lot of ocean to search.
Furthermore, the Mediterranean is the birthplace of our civilization. No Sardegnian could sit idly and let the Sirens defile it.
In fact, allow me to make a proposition: how about we use this joint mission as a way to improve relations between us?
Did you think we had forgotten about what you did to Vichya? Surely you understand that our trust must be earned.
I must admit you have a point... The success of this operation depends on our mutual trust.
Our mission is as follows: search the Mediterranean for the source of Siren activity and eliminate it...
However, I'm going to have to add a condition to your participation in this operation.
No Sardegnian battleships will be allowed to join the search. Violators of this rule will be dealt with accordingly by the Royal Navy.
(Ah, making arbitrary rules when it suits you... The Royal Navy still uses the same old bag of tricks.)
(But just you wait. Soon, you shall all dance upon my stage...!)
Littorio, how are matters developing? Is my assistance needed?
Not for now. All is going as planned.
To gain control over the Mediterranean, we will need to break the Royal Navy's blockade. We will need Malta in order to do so.
As long as the Royal Navy has their hands on that island, their little queen will be able to monitor our every move.
On the other hand, if we wrest Malta away from the Royal Navy, it would not be long until the entire Mediterranean belongs to us.
As long as we send a few ships to aid Warspite with her little Siren hunt, we should be able to avoid any suspicion.
Using the cover of night, I will send our strongest ships to lie in wait at Taranto.
At the dawn of the next day, we will pincer Malta while the Royal Navy is still occupied.
Warspite may have a reputation for being swift, but even she won't be able to react to this.
Your plan sounds good, but this would be a formal declaration of war against the Royal Navy... Do you really think we can win...?
Veneto, what are we to do if our own flagship is this hesitant about taking action?
You are the flagship that leads the mightiest fleet in the land. You need simply have faith in me and our glorious fleet.
If you're not going to have more confidence in both yourself and in your fleet, then you should just let me be flagship for this operation.
Ahaha... Sometimes, it seems like you're the big sister here...
Littorio, you always know what to say when my resolve wavers. Let's carry out your plan.
Well, except that part about letting you be the flagship.
If that is what you want, then so it shall be.
Besides, with you as our flagship, I can dedicate all my attention to fighting instead. One of us will earn their glory in the planning room, and the other will earn it on the battlefield.
Hehe...
Now that we've decided on our next move, we should treasure the night ahead of us.
It would be such a tragedy for you spend this night alone, my beautiful signora. Care to join me?
Why, I would love to~
